title: How to use WAF to protect your web applications with Azure Front Door | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to get started with Web Application Firewall (WAF) for Azure Front Door.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.
